mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.bulletin_no , t1.title , t1.organ_contact , t1.telephone , t1.bulletin_type , t1.material_supply , t1.implement_company , t1.report_date , t1.author , t1.file_company , t1.company_tel , t1.include_mars , t1.publish_date , t1.complete_date , t1.change_no , t1.perform_requirement , t1.change_comment , t1.remark , t1.report_no , t1.report_time , t1.reply_no , t1.reply_time , t1.complete_time , t1.forward_no , t1.forward_time , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_es_noticeinfo t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.bulletin_no , t1.title , t1.organ_contact , t1.telephone , t1.bulletin_type , t1.material_supply , t1.implement_company , t1.report_date , t1.author , t1.file_company , t1.company_tel , t1.include_mars , t1.publish_date , t1.complete_date , t1.change_no , t1.perform_requirement , t1.change_comment , t1.remark , t1.report_no , t1.report_time , t1.reply_no , t1.reply_time , t1.complete_time , t1.forward_no , t1.forward_time , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_es_noticeinfo t1 where t1.bulletin_no = #{bulletinNo}

t1.version =t1.version+1,

t1.attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

mapper.select: select count(distinct batch_no) as countName from hdkf_ES_NOTICEINFO_EFFECTIVE eff where eff.bulletin_id = #{id} and eff.do_flag is not null
